name: Chronicles of Enigma Shadows of Eternity
description: In "Chronicles of Enigma: Shadows of Eternity," embark on a perilous quest through enchanted realms as a chosen hero, harnessing the forces of light and darkness to restore balance, confront mythical creatures, and unravel the enigmatic secrets that shape the destiny of Eternia.

plugins.packName: Chronicles of Enigma Shadows of Eternity
